name: Show_Labor_GES_Column
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(DVM_Project_Additional_GES,DVM_Engineering_Labor_GES)*><*CTX( Container(DVM_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Editable) )*> <*CTX( Container(DVM_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(DVM_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Unit_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(DVM_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(DVM_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_ListPrice).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(DVM_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_WTW_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(DVM_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_MPA_Price).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>

<*CTX ( Container(DVM_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX( Container(DVM_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(DVM_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES_Unit_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(DVM_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(DVM_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES_ListPrice).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(DVM_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES_WTW_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX ( Container(DVM_Additional_Labour_Container).Column(GES_MPA_Price).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>
